content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened" )

content.text: 0) In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@14:21 / AC
		:ppt ( "the first seven ingredients"@22:49 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
		)
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Crumble beef and sausage over mixture; mix well.
3) Grill, uncovered, over medium-hot heat for 4-6 minutes on each side or until no longer pink.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Grill"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "medium-hot heat"@26:41 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "4-6 minutes"@46:57 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until no longer pink"@74:94 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
